results.title: Assorted Film Making Accessories
results.brief_description: “Coated Walz Filter for Color Film housed in original cardboard box. Walz brand clear plastic case with lid and base. Metal rimmed light brown/orange glass lens. Instructions included Kodak Kodachrome 25 colour movie film daylight for 8mm roll (7.5m KM459P) Tin can embossed with Kodak logo on the top. Unused reel of film. Tin sealed together with black duct tape. Original box Envelope Instructions Film price includes processing by Kodak. Mailing envelope enclosed (this has never been used and is folded in a small square) 7.5 metres in length of douible 8mm film on this roll which is intended to yield 15 metres in length of 8mm movies. The additional film at each end serves as leader and trailer for light protection and camera loading. Process before Oct 1979. KM459P CAT 416 9918 Daylight, ASA 25, 15 DIN 2 pairs of mono ear buds to be plugged in to a crystal radio. 1. Brown leather pouch with pink ear bud. 2. Black vinyl puch with cream ear bud. Sunbeam lens brush. Sundry cord in ziplock bag. National brand. Could possibly have been a cord to connect flash. However there doesn’t see to be a donated item which this pairs with. Cyldon brand film reel. (for 8mm) Light metal (tin?). Made in England Markers for 50, 100, 150 and 200 feet.”

results.title: Title Your Films in Colour Austral Plastic Colour Titling Set
results.brief_description: “Title Your Films in Colour, Austral Plastic Colour Titling Set. Present your films in a professional manner by the use of these attractive letters and numbers in full colours. Distributed by Kodak (Australasia) Pty Ltd. 28 envelopes: 1. Mixture of numbers (21 digits) 2. Zz: 10 letters 3. Yy: 10 letters 4. Xx: 10 letters 5. Ww: 10 letters 6. Vv: 10 letters 7. Uu: 10 letters 8. Tt: 10 letters 9. Ss: 10 letters 10. Rr: 10 letters 11. Qq: 10 letters 12. Pp: 10 letters 13. Oo: 10 letters 14. Nn: 10 letters 15. Mm: 10 letters 16. Ll: 10 letters 17. Kk: 10 letters 18. Jj: 9 letters 19. Ii: 9 letters 20. Hh: 10 letters 21. Gg: 10 letters 22. Ff: 10 letters 23. Ee: 8 letters 24. Dd: 10 letters 25. Cc: 10 letters 26. Bb: 10 letters 27. Symbols/punctuation: 34 symbols.”

results.title: Posso Cinema Projection Spools
results.brief_description:
1. Posso (brand) cinema projection spools and Posso case in original cardboard box. Made in France. Case: grey plastic base with clear lid. There is a small label on the original box which suggests it was sold for 90 cents. 8mm - 200ft / 60metres.

2 sheets of yellowed paper for safe storage purposes 2. Posso cinema projection spool and Posso plastic case housed in original cardboard box. The reverse of the cardboard box has a tab which says ‘hang for display’ 8mm 400ft / 120 metres Case: grey plastic base with clear lid. 2 sheets of yellowed paper for safe storage purposes: 8mm wide ribbon of card lose in reel.

  1. Posso cinema projection spool with metal core and Posso case housed in original cardboard box. Attached label suggest it was purchased from Grace Bros for $1.35. 8mm 400ft / 120 metres Case: grey plastic base with clear lid. 2 sheets of yellowed paper for safe storage purposes: 8mm wide ribbon of card lose in reel.”

results.title: Eumig Wien Type P8 Electrical Projector in box
results.brief_description:
Boxed Projector Eumig Wien Type P8 electrical projector Housed in Vinyl bound box. Green felt covered board/lid for inside box. This board has a leather tab which helps to lift the board up. The top metal handle on the projector can be clicked in to stay up, or it can be pushed down. The feet at the front are adjustable and allow for a tilting adjustment. Lens: Coated Eupro F1.6 25mm lens The machine must be opened to erect the spool arms. Brown power cord with a Eumig logo. Australian power plug (Ring grip, 10 AMP, 250 V, Made in Australia) English instruction manual enclosed. Eumig metal spool housed in original cardboard box. Made in Austria.

Reel capacity: 120m / 400ft diameter: 175mm diameter x 13mm depth Kelvin clear plastic spool. Made in Australia.

Reel capacity: 120m / 400ft diameter: 177mm diameter x 14mm depth yellow piece of card ribbon inside.

2 identical Philips projection lamps in their original boxes with double sided instructions. The lamp inside the box is packaged between two pieces of corrugated cardboard. 7238N / 05 12V 100W B15S A8 Made in Germany

Broken brush made from real hair. Made in Japan. (used for cleaning?)

results.title: Hanimex Rondette 400S 35mm colour slide projector
results.brief_description: “Hanimex Rondette 400S 35mm colour slide projector Made in New Zealand f2.8 projector 8.5mm 230 - 240 V 50CYC A.C. Only 60W Use 12V 50W Iodine Quartz Lamp. Made in New Zealand by Hanimex Manufacturing Ltd. Green guarantee sticker on the bottom: N.Z. No 37229 Housed in original cardboard box. Air New Zealand MELBOURNE destination tag stapled to top of the box. Purchased from Christchurch International Duty Free Shop. 3 slides: - Man in Traditional dress. ‘Taken on Board Rasa Sayang. Handwritten label: BL 23 - Test slide for Reflector Adjustment - Kodachrome transparency of 3 men performing in a band. Standard 36 Han-O-Matic Magazine original box with index printed on outside. Kindermann (Adapter Rachmen) original red cardboard box. 37 Kindermann Adapters for 110 slides. Made in West Germany. Three plastic 110 Film slide viewers Paperwork included: Kodacolour II Film Instructions Hanimex La Rondette 400S QI Instructions Hanimex Magazine Instructions Hanimex Guarantee card”

results.title: EUMIG Mark 607D Dual 8 Silent Projector
results.brief_description:
“EUMIG Mark 607D Dual 8 Silent Projector Made in Austria 100/250V 50/60 Hz 145W Pr.Lampe Max 75W 12V serial number: 5274584 Housed in original cardboard box, foam inner in two pieces. Separate power cord with Australian plug. 1 empty reel Instruction manual Eumig guarantee certificate Peter Chews shop introduction card in a promotional bookmark format. Eumig service instructions Lamp Economy Switch print-out”

This projector is in a working condition, tested Feb 2020.
*Possibly purchased from Peter Chew’s shop, Singapore. Shop card found with warranty.
